TextBody:
Hi Paul,

Thanks for reaching out!
Please download the latest client and check if the issue persists:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPLinux_v2.4.4.1004/EPPClient_rhel_8.10_v2.4.4.1004_x86_64.tar.gz
Before installing it, uninstall the old one, and modify the options.sh( uncomment lines 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, 11, and modify the server's IP, port, and department if needed) file to look something like this:


Please also make sure you have enough licenses at System Configuration -> System licensing.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
